column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////All of the food was great
column2: but what really maximized my experience here was our fabulous service. Like I said
column3: we sat in the bar because it didn't look very busy... except what I didn't notice was that the bar wraps around and has tables on the other side as well. At one point the bartender
column5: had an almost completely full bar and all the bar tables all by himself and we never once longed for anything. He was well versed on the menu
column8: and very attentive. At one point I accidentally spilled my drink (obviously my fault) and before I could even order another one he had already replaced it for me at no extra charge (greatly appreciated
